profile.summary:
Computer Science Enthusiast skilled in Computer Networking, Systems, Python, and C++. Strong research professional with a Master of Technology (M.Tech.) focused in Information Security from Indraprastha Institute of Information Technology, Delhi.
Software Developer, Freelancer, DevOps Engineer and Consultant, F&O Trader
profile.headline: Software Engineer at LinkedIn

projects.description: Coded and Configured a system capable of serving ad traffic for 80k-100k domains over HTTPS. This project is now another revenue-generating asset for the company.
projects.title: HTTPS 10K

projects.description: Architected Infrastructure for the whole project capable of delivering millions of notifications. Replicated the same infra to multiple AWS accounts using terraform for different clients. Created pipelines for monitoring, alerting and CI/CD. Developed many APIs and programs for autoscaling, auto-failover, removing code dependencies and automation.
projects.title: Push Notifications

projects.description: Developed an assistant that do tasks after listening to autherized user's commands, with scripting and AI mode support. Got Letter of Recognition from the professor for this projet.
projects.title: Digital Personal Assistant

projects.description: A Network based file system with custom commands. The system supports Access Control Lists to override normal DAC permissions of Linux. Files of different users were encrypted with their different keys, Initialization vectors and Salt.
projects.title: Encrypted File System

projects.description: An App to connect everyone at IIITD, where anyone from IIITD can ask any question. Users get the feed according to their interests
projects.title: IIITD Quora

projects.description: A Java Website created to connect doctors and patients and to learn Object Oriented Programming and Designs
projects.title: SmartHealth

projects.description: Developed and Deployed an E-voting App on Windows Azure, where encrypted user votes were added homomorphically without decryption
projects.title: Homomorphic Encryption Over Integers on Cloud
